entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Friday 31 March 2023
